---
title: Vendor Endpoints
description: Dokumentasi endpoint API untuk Vendor
---

# Vendor Endpoints

## Data Vendor

### Daftar Vendor
```http
GET /v1/vendor/penyedia
```

**Query Parameters:**
- `kategori` (optional): Kategori vendor
- `status` (optional): Status vendor (aktif|tidak_aktif|blacklist)
- `kota` (optional): Kota domisili vendor
- `page` (optional): Nomor halaman
- `limit` (optional): Jumlah item per halaman

**Response:**
```json
{
  "data": [
    {
      "vendor_id": "VDR-001",
      "nama": "PT ABC Technology",
      "npwp": "01.234.567.8-901.000",
      "status": "aktif",
      "kategori": ["IT", "Konsultan"],
      "kota": "Jakarta",
      "skor_kinerja": 85.5
    }
  ]
}
```

### Detail Vendor
```http
GET /v1/vendor/penyedia/{vendor_id}
```

### Kinerja Vendor
```http
GET /v1/vendor/penyedia/{vendor_id}/kinerja
```

**Response:**
```json
{
  "data": {
    "vendor_id": "VDR-001",
    "skor_keseluruhan": 85.5,
    "level": "Baik",
    "evaluasi_terakhir": "2024-01-15",
    "riwayat_project": [
      {
        "project_id": "PRJ-001",
        "nama_project": "Pengadaan Laptop",
        "nilai_kontrak": 500000000,
        "skor": 88.0,
        "status": "selesai"
      }
    ],
    "statistik": {
      "total_project": 25,
      "success_rate": 92.0,
      "avg_completion_time": 85,
      "avg_quality_score": 87.5
    }
  }
}
```

## Evaluasi

### Submit Evaluasi
```http
POST /v1/vendor/evaluasi
```

**Request Body:**
```json
{
  "vendor_id": "VDR-001",
  "project_id": "PRJ-001",
  "evaluator_id": "USER-001",
  "kriteria": {
    "kualitas": 85,
    "ketepatan_waktu": 90,
    "layanan": 88,
    "inovasi": 75
  },
  "catatan": "Vendor menyelesaikan project dengan baik"
}
```

### History Evaluasi
```http
GET /v1/vendor/evaluasi/history/{vendor_id}
```

## Monitoring

### Vendor Performance Dashboard
```http
GET /v1/vendor/monitoring/dashboard
```

### Alert Vendor
```http
GET /v1/vendor/monitoring/alerts
```

## Analitik

### Statistik Vendor
```http
GET /v1/vendor/analitik/statistik
```

**Response:**
```json
{
  "data": {
    "total_vendor": 5000,
    "vendor_aktif": 4500,
    "vendor_blacklist": 50,
    "avg_performance": 82.5,
    "top_categories": ["IT", "Konstruksi", "Konsultan"]
  }
}
```
